objects.text:
• Energy-efficient ventless technology
• Multiple drying cycles
• Advanced moisture sensor
• Space-saving design

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🌟 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🎯 Precise electronic controls with LED time display
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with convenient front-loading design
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensor for optimal drying results
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting
• ⚙️ Easy-to-use control dial with multiple fabric care settings
• 🛠️ Built-in maintenance reminder system
• 📏 Space-saving compact design without compromising performance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern product advertisement layout for a home appliance. The background utilizes a dynamic diagonal dual-tone gradient with a deep navy on the left and light gray on the right, intersected with thin diagonal accent lines for depth. The eye-catching heading (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) uses a bold, futuristic typeface in white, followed by a tagline (`tagline`) in vibrant blue for emphasis. A list of product features (`description`) is left-aligned and set in a clean sans-serif font. The product price (`price`) is prominently displayed in bold white, and a bright blue call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) encourages immediate pre-order. A high-resolution dryer image (`product_image`) anchors the design on the right side, blending seamlessly with the lighter background.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1E3A5F`
- Midnight Blue: `#0B1931`
- Sky Blue: `#4BB5FF`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Steel Gray (gradient overlay): `#f2f2f2`, `#e6e6e6`
product_color: The product image features a modern, minimalist color palette dominated by soft whites and sleek blacks, ideal for conveying cleanliness, efficiency, and advanced technology in an advertisement banner. The body of the washer is a clean white (#F7F7F7), providing a fresh and neutral background that highlights the central black door (#1D1D1D) and dark-tinted drum (#2B2B2B). The display screen glows with a vivid blue (#00BFFF) for the timer, drawing attention to the device's modern digital interface. Subtle accents like the chrome dial with hints of red (#FF5E57) and blue (#33C1FF) add a pop of color, reinforcing the appliance's functionality and advanced control options.
